children.name: visible
children.description: Gets or sets the visibility of the current element.

children.name: rotate

parameters.name: angle `Number`
parameters.description: The angle of rotation in decimal degrees.Measured in clockwise direction with 0 pointing "right".Negative values or values greater than 360 will be normalized.

children.description: Rotates the element with the specified parameters.

children.name: position
children.description: Get or sets the element position.

children.name: y
children.description: The y-coordinate of the top-left corner of the rectangle.

children.name: x
children.description: The x-coordinate of the top-left corner of the rectangle.

children.name: width
children.description: Sets the width of the rectangle.

children.name: height
children.description: Sets the height of the rectangle.
